title: Does the random player just  have to deal with it?
body:
Played a game today where i got matched with a 4 man premade on my team. After about 8 minutes i was harassed repeatedly by all 4 members of my team, being sworn at, spam pinged and anything else of a toxic manner you can think of. It doesn't bother me now, but it really raises the question of is riot really looking our for these solo players? Im someone who really likes to play out the game and try and make clutch decisions/plays that could turn the tides of the match, but when you've got your whole team sending you threats and just being an overall cuck it can be kinda hard to look past it all.

Conclusion; it would be nice to have some reassurance that something can be done about these players, nothing is more hard to play through, then a game where even when you are trying your hardest, your "teammates" will go out of their way to make the game harder, just to annoy/harass you.

Never knew how frustrating it could be until it actually happened to me.
